Name: Caipirissima
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE lime wedges in the base of shaker to release juice and oils in its skin. Add rum and sugar. SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.
Review: A Daiquiri-like cocktail made in the style of a Caipirinha .
